nodes.text: Nicht Ka was a planet in the Sith Worlds, a region of space within the Stygian Caldera, which was located in the Esstran sector of the Outer Rim Territories.
Nicht Ka was located along the Nache Bhelfia hyperlane, between Korriban and Ziost.

A cold, barren rock affected by ammonia rains, Nicht Ka was uninhabitable, although an hexagonal structure was built in its mountains to contain Warb Null's unique lightsaber and suit of battle armor.
